src_original: H 68a2; C 332b11 (2.4.4.3.2) katham eṣāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
catuṣprakārapudgalabhedāt:  kuhakapudgalabhedāt prathamasya, lokāyatikapudgalabhedād dvitīyasya, svayaṃdṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyipudgalabhedāt tṛtīyasya, śrutaparamapudgalabhedāc
tgt_original: 由四種人差別故，一由貢高人差別故、二由路柯耶胝柯人差別故、三由自見取住人差別故、四由聞勝人差別故。

src_original: H 68a2; C 332b15 (2.4.4.3.3.1) tatra kuhake dharmaḥ pratisaraṇaṃ na pudgalaḥ, sāṃkathyaviniścayena jñānādhigamyatvān neryāpathamātrakeṇeti.  asyaivāparaḥ paryāyaḥ:
tgt_original: 此中於貢高人，以法為量非人，由共論說思量為智所得故，不但由威儀差別。

src_original: bhagavatā pudgalo ’pi deśito dharmo ’pi.  tatra dharma eva pratisaraṇaṃ na pudgalo janapadanirukter anabhiniveśāt.
tgt_original: 復次佛世尊有說人有說法，此中法為量非人。

src_original: H 68a3; C 332b20 (2.4.4.3.3.2) sa punar dharmo dvividhaḥ:

tgt_original: 此中義為量非文句，由不愛著國土言說故。 何以故？

src_original: na hi śrutaparameṇa bhavitavyam, api tv arthaś cintayitavyas tulayitavya upaparīkṣitavya iti.
tgt_original: 不應成取文句為勝決定，應思量簡擇義。
